Code: EXEC SQL SELECT COD_LOT_FENAL, NUM_APOLICE, NUM_APOL_SINISTRO, NUM_CONTROLE_FENAL, COD_LOT_CEF, COD_CLIENTE, SITUACAO, DATA_GERA_MOV, COD_ORIGEM_AVISO, DTINIVIG, TIMESTAMP, COD_COBERTURA FROM seguros.v0sini_loterico01 WHERE NUM_APOL_SINISTRO BETWEEN :SI6GW01.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO_INICIAL AND :SI6GW01.NUM_APOL_SINISTRO_FINAL AND NUM_APOLICE BETWEEN :SI6GW01.NUM_APOLICE_INICIAL AND :SI6GW01.NUM_APOLICE_FINAL AND COD_LOT_FENAL BETWEEN :SI6GW01.COD_LOT_FENAL_INICIAL AND :SI6GW01.COD_LOT_FENAL_FINAL AND COD_LOT_CEF BETWEEN :SI6GW01.COD_LOT_CEF_INICIAL AND :SI6GW01.COD_LOT_CEF_FINAL END SQL
